title: Increase Total Staking Limit
body:
Increase the total staking limit per 90-days from 5 million to 10 million $NFT!

The Opportunity:

Enable more $NFT holders to participate in APY opportunities while locking up relatively stable circulating supply.

The Risk:

At the end of each staking period, there may be more off-ramping.  This could be limited by adding additional reasons for staking, such as collectible drops.
author: 0xEC2aF0e1445d82fC834e09f15E6f646e6880Cf92
